creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: very dark blue/black bodice; blue skirt; long V neckline; cuffs trimmed in brown velvet with decorative stitching; dark orange vertical velvet elements on bodice; purple ribbed velvet at neckline; maroon and green velvet at bottom of V opening; band of bright multicolored organic stitching at bottom; inner hem lined in orange
title: Dress (rob tanura)
